content: **need more yarn for this pattern check out my online yarn shop for more supplies ** three birds yarn studio 1 this wintergreen headband pattern is a follow up to my wintergreen mitten pattern this pattern is perfect if you would like to complete the matching set and use up leftover yarn this pattern calls for super bulky weight yarn that is a little on the lighter side i have suggested three yarn brands below that are the perfect weight included are instructions in both chart and written form depending on your preference **gauge** 6 sts and 9 5 row make a 2 square in stockinette stitch worked in the round **materials** 58 yds 80g/53m of super bulky weight yarn suggested yarns malabrigo noventa baah yarn sequoia manos del uruguay franca us 10 5 6 5mm needles cable needle tapestry needle to weave in ends **skills/stitches required** knit/purl cable knitting knitting flat cast on/bind off 1 https //threebirdsyarnstudio com/
